alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Tammany Parish through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abita Springs, or near Covington, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Abita Springs and Lacombe. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 59 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
